title: Kovot Dad BBQ Grill Set with Carry Case - 4 Piece Grill Set Includes Spatula, Tongs, Digital Thermometer and Carry Case (Dad BBQ 4-Piece Set)
features: The Ultimate Grill Set for Any Dad – 4 Piece BBQ Tools Set Includes: Spatula, Tongs, Digital Thermometer and Carry Case
Spatula and Tongs Both Have the Word “DAD” On Them – Bonus Beer Bottle Opener As Well
Digital Meat Thermometer Includes Instruction Manual
Sleek Carry Case Makes this Set Easy to Pack Up and Go
description: Get your dad the gift of the grilling season with the KOVOT Dad BBQ Grill Set with Carry Case. The set includes (1) spatula, (1) tongs, (1) digital meat thermometer, and (1) carry case. The high quality spatula and tongs both have the word “DAD” on them, as well as a beer bottle opener. The easy to read digital meat thermometer includes an instruction manual. The sleek carry case makes this set easy to pack up and go wherever the grilling takes you. Tongs and spatula measure 16 3/4″ inches long.
